Name: 江湖余生：缘起
Supported languages: 大梦山庄是传承了三代的武林世家，地处姑苏城郊，一向乐善好施，在武林中薄有威名，可惜不慎触怒唐门，惨遭灭族之祸，仅有一人幸存，既是凌氏嫡支的五公子凌无厌。凌无厌被父亲旧友救出火海，于千里之外的一处山林洞窟中醒来，却不知何故失去了记忆，人情世故皆忘去了，心智与孩子无异。 故事以“灭门+失忆”的套路开启。我们将跟随凌公子一起走进这快意恩仇的江湖，但与寻常的武侠主角不同，他并不是那种充满侠义精神的英雄，他只是一个因灭门惨案而失去记忆的普通少年，他优柔寡断，儿女情长，轻信他人，都说，人在江湖，身不由己，但比起孤身一人，仇恨相伴，他更希望能点一壶清酒，邀一群好友，看着这客栈依旧人来人往，生意兴隆，希望这江湖不只有阴谋诡计，腥风血雨，更有侠肝义胆，似水柔情...... 势力 大梦山庄: 为江湖世家凌氏所居。凌氏传承四代，祖先曾追随大天王唐潜征战江湖，唐潜战死之时，相传只有凌氏祖先在侧。 蜀中唐门: 江湖四大世家之首，自唐时起就以暗器毒药威震江湖，族内弟子众多，派系林立，既有狡黠鬼诈之士，也有忠义双全的大侠，既相互征伐，又一致对外。 长平花冢: 花冢位于白起坑赵卒四十万处，冢下白骨累累，冢上百花齐放。以酿酒和制毒而闻名天下。 还有更多门派等你发现 制造 以生存制造为核心，不是利用打怪来升级，而是去探索物资，制作食物和药品，保护和增强自己 丰富的制作系统
Full audio languages: 可以自由尝试合成新的物品 生存 民以食为天，足够的食物是你生存的前提 如果发现自己能力不足，不如试着去后山看看，也许机缘就在那里 记忆缺失，但仇人仍在，面对敌人的追杀，生存下去！ 武学 近百种武学秘籍，每次可能获得的秘籍都各不相同
Reviews: 每次游玩体验也完全不同 战斗 基础攻防搭配秘籍，与对手见招拆招 独具特色的回合制卡牌战斗系统
Header image: 让每一次刀剑交锋都充满策略 支线剧情 以支线任务勾勒出丰富多彩的江湖世界众生相 多分支剧情
Website: 每一次选择都会影响到最终的结局 伙伴 凌无厌: 凌氏五公子。 遭遇灭门惨案，却不知为何苏醒于一处山林洞窟，完全不记得前尘往事了。 海孤帆: 曾经是个江湖刀客，后在小镇上邂逅了妻子，从此归隐江湖，成了一个打铁匠。 花钿子: 十二三岁的女孩，天真浪漫，向往花冢外的世界。趁家人不备，逃了出来，路遇匪徒，被凌无厌所救。 此外还有十余名特性各异的伙伴可供选择上阵 我们很清楚它有许许多多的问题，但是相信它是一块未经雕刻的璞玉。 我们尽力还原着心目中对武侠的理解，用精彩的剧情，塑造鲜活的人物，兼顾游戏性的同时，勾勒一个有血有肉的江湖世界 每个少年心中都有武侠梦，青衫磊落，纵情江湖。有美酒，有佳人，有奇遇。有绝世武功，谈笑间轻松制敌。有深厚的内功，飞花摘叶均可伤人。 我们在梦里接受万人敬仰。对心仪的人，勾勒出一百种跟她携手踏马归去的画面。写出来做出来，胸中便有一腔年少的轻狂如屠龙的热血。

Name: Professor Teaches QuickBooks 2020
Supported languages: Professor Teaches provides interactive, hands-on training for QuickBooks 2020, the premier small business accounting software. QuickBooks is designed to help manage small businesses, including product inventory, sales, invoices, company payroll, and more. Learn how to improve your productivity and run your business more efficiently using QuickBooks. Each interactive course is organized for fast and easy learning with hands-on exercises to help you build new skills quickly. The Fast Way to Learn QuickBooks! Learn from each of the courses or just the one you need! More than just videos, you’ll interact to perform the correct action during each exercise for better learning and retention. Hundreds of learning topics and beginner through advanced subjects are included. Chapters are organized into specific learning objectives — easily available from the main menu. Build Your Business &amp, Increase Efficiency Teach yourself how to automate most of your accounting tasks: printing checks, paying bills, and tracking expenses. You can build your skills quickly to unlock the power of QuickBooks and expand your business. Effectively use QuickBooks Pro small business accounting software to help your business grow. Professor Teaches training includes: • Accounting Basics • QuickBooks Fundamentals • Setting Up the Chart of Accounts • Creating Items • Entering Transactions for Incoming Funds • Maintaining Financial Information • Working with Reports • Setting Up Lists • Tracking sales • Tracking expenses • Entering customer payments • Creating invoices and forms

Name: Suez Canal Simulator
About the game: Take control of the Suez Canal! Pilot a ship from the Mediterranean to the Red Sea and back. Take part in prototypical northbound or southbound convoys. Travel thru Egypt and feel the wind in your hair and the sand in your eyes. A full 1:1 scale re-creation of the 193-kilometer-long waterway that changed the world
Supported languages: the Suez Canal! A LITTLE HISTORY The history of the Suez Canal predates Cleopatra with a manmade waterway linking the ancient cities surrounding Cairo with the Red Sea. Built under the leadership of Ferdinand de Lesseps
Full audio languages: the Suez Canal opened for passage in 1869 and instantly revolutionized global travel and commerce. The canal was operated by the British and the French until 1956 when it was nationalized by Egyptian President Gamal Abdel Nasser. The Suez Crisis of 1956 was an ill-fated attempt by the British
Header image: and Israelis to seize control of the canal. The Six Days War found a fleet of 15 ships stranded in the canal from 1967 until 1975
Website: nicknamed the 'Yellow Fleet' from their decks always being covered with blowing sand. The 1973 Yom Kippur War littered the banks of the canal with the remnants of war
Support url: much of which is still visible today. WHAT TO EXPECT Simulating a journey thru the Suez Canal allows you to gain an understanding of what to expect on the real journey. After a journey through Suez Canal Simulator you will be graced with the knowledge a seasoned mariner would need in order to approach such a journey with confidence. If you plan on taking a trip through the Suez Canal then this simulator can accurately teach you the canal waterways
Metacritic url: and signal stations. Drive massive container ships
Negative: and sail thru the canal on the winds of Egypt's fertile plain and the Sinai Peninsula. Meet ships along the way and take care to avoid collisions in the canal. Watch for traffic and signals in the canal or watch the sun rise and set over the Mediterranean and the Red Sea. With buttery-smooth physics
Recommendations: Suez Canal Simulator will set the standard for PC simulator games for years to come. WITH SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE Own one of human engineering's most epic achievements.. own the Suez Canal!.. Get underway now
Notes: add Suez Canal Simulator to your Steam Library today! SUEZ CANAL SIMULATOR... AVAILABLE NOW ON STEAM!

Name: Seventh Knight PC Security

Name: 3D Joys
About the game: 3D Joys is more of a utility and is short for 3D Joysticks. It's called that because it's based on Joysticks used in arcades. 3D Joys allow the player to go 6 different directions instead of 4 directions like from a regular Joystick with the help of VR controllers. The player can summon their 3d Joystick at the position of their hand by using the grip button and choosing from up
Header image: forward or backwards. Testing their hand eye coordination. VR Memory Cube is the first addition to 3D Joys. Test your memory and maybe possibly improve it with a color remembering game like the classic Simon game. Basically
Website: the game is to remember a sequence of colors on a cube while each side of the cube will light up different colors that will resemble your 3D Joystick. Online Leaderboard has been implemented for the people that want to show off. Offline Leaderboard is also an option. Oculus Rift is the only VR headset I tested this game on. The future of 3D Joys will depend on its growth because there is only one person working on this project which is myself and I am a college dropout student with a Digital Arts Media Certificate. I started working on this project when I had my first Computer Programing class
Support url: where I learned Python and which made me pursue other programming languages like C#. Unity is the engine that I am using to make this game. I am not a professional. I try as hard as I can to bring my vision for this game into fruition and it may take longer than someone that knows what they're doing but I hope you see the potential and come along the ride that is 3D Joys. @WhoDisz

Name: Plunder
About the game: Adventure Awaits! Set sail on the seas of Plunder, a massive open world packed with frightening beasts, quirky quests, dreadful pirates, and the dominating force of the British Military that you may either choose to join or destroy. With a straight-forward reputation system and action-based decision making, you will decide your fate as a Pirate Legend through quests, battles, and exploration. Endless Options! Become your own kind of captain. Will you live as a hulking, armor-covered brute cutting down everyone in your way? A cloaked pirate wizard bringing lightning storms down onto enemy ships? A quick sharpshooter taking out enemies from afar before they even get the chance to see you? Or even a modest fisherman who yearns to see new lands but wishes to stay neutral in the faces of conflict? The quick-to-learn RPG system of Plunder will let you decide. Explore! Explore seemingly endless amounts of diverse, handcrafted environments. You will adventure through tropical islands, deep caverns, snowy cliffs, grassy forests, deadly swamps, dark dungeons, and much more. Be warned, however, that deadly creatures may reside in these areas and want nothing more than to tear you limb from limb. They are most common in the dungeons beneath the surface, which are fraught with puzzles, traps, but, most importantly, treasure! Sail to over 10 towns ranging from modest fishing villages to large bustling cities, each with unique personalities, quests, and allegiances (that you may change). Raid them, liberate them, protect them, or even build one from the ground up, the choice is yours. Man the Cannons! Engage in real-time naval combat against ships of varying sizes. Fire your port and starboard cannons, or ram their broadside if you're feeling extra aggressive. Board their vessel, kill their crew, and rob them for all they're worth! Use the fast and maneuverable Sloop, the sturdy and balanced Brigantine, or the cannon-heavy Galleon! A Legendary Tale! So what say ye? Will you fight with the law and rid the world of pirate savagery or will you bask in it and reap the rewards? A tale is ready to be told, dear captain, but it is your job to tell it.
